posts.post_content: @ragingoblin13: You use too many ellipses and you're wrong. InjuryMan and Cuttups are right: since the "tap target creature you control" comes after the colon, it's part of the effect, not part of the cost. That means you can target your own Magus of the Arena with the effect, even if he's tapped.
posts.html:
@ragingoblin13: You use too many ellipses and you're wrong. InjuryMan and Cuttups are right: since the "tap target creature you control" comes after the colon, it's part of the effect, not part of the cost. That means you can target your own Magus of the Arena with the effect, even if he's tapped.

posts.post_content: no my friend..you cant pay the cost of it..yeah you can pay mana..but you cant pay the tapping..but its an awesome card paired with something like hateflayer..mirri the cursed is another nice pair..maybe a soul collector..but my favorite trio is this kiki-jiki and hateflayer..kiki-jiki makes a copy of hateflayer..magus taps one flayer...pay the untap cost and then attack with them both..then pay both untaps to do 15 life in one turn..for 11 mana all togather its not a bad trio
